WorkItem.Description:
Hi.
 
Thank you for Prism v4.0.
 
I would like to request that AcceptanceTestLibrary\Common\Launcher\Silverlight\BrowserLauncherBase.cs is enhanced to to get the browser process using other options (like mentioned as a todo item in the code).
 
I have found that if a run a test where the application title changes, then a call to "SilverlightAppLauncher.UnloadBrowser(APP_TITLE);" does not work as expected, where APP_TITLE was initially used in FixtureBase.LaunchApplication to get the browser process when it was first launched.
 
There are numerous work-arounds, but none are very elegant.
 
Does anyone know of a viable solution?
 
Thank you.
WorkItem.Summary: Feature Request: Enhance AcceptanceTestLibrary\Common\Launcher\Silverlight\BrowserLauncherBase.cs to to get the browser process using other options
